body_html:
skip_input is not compatible with regular TF RNN layers and we plan to not expose it in later revisions.
Btw, you'd try tf 1.5 or later, it has CuDNN RNN layers which manages vars for you. (but this is orthogonal to ur question.)
body_text:
skip_input is not compatible with regular TF RNN layers and we plan to not expose it in later revisions.
Btw, you'd try tf 1.5 or later, it has CuDNN RNN layers which manages vars for you. (but this is orthogonal to ur question.)
body:
```skip_input``` is not compatible with regular TF RNN layers and we plan to not expose it in later revisions.
Btw, you'd try tf 1.5 or later, it has CuDNN RNN layers which manages vars for you. (but this is orthogonal to ur question.)
